pathAssistantSteps.info: In order to move to WORKING: please confirm the Creative Owner is correct and add the Working Link and Vendor.

In order to CANCEL this request, please fill out a reason in the box to the left and press SAVE.


If your request is in DRAFT this will DELETE your request.


The creative team will be notified, stop working on this request, and confirm if any costs have been incurred to date.
This CAR is complete! Give yourself a round of applause.

Please be sure to fill out as many details as possible throughout the CAR.


In order to move from DRAFT make sure to SAVE your work and then click SUBMIT FOR APPROVAL.


If this is a Customer Marketing Request a notification will be sent to the HQ Customer Marketing Team for review.

In order to place something ON HOLD, please provide a reason in the box to the left and press SAVE.


The creative team will be notified, stop working on this request, and confirm if any costs have been incurred to date.

If you are the reviewer, please review the CAR below and confirm all details before clicking APPROVE. If information is missing or unclear, please click REJECT and provide any questions/clarifications.


An email notification will be sent back to the original requester.

In order to move to ASSIGNED: please assign a Creative Owner to the left.


In order to move to WORKING: please add a Creative Owner, Working Link and Vendor.


The Creative Owner will be notified.

In order to move to COMPLETE: please provide the Final Spend and Proof of Delivery.


Once added, click SAVE.
